sentence.Network_en: The weak antiferromagnetic interaction exists between Co ( II ) ions intrachain.
sentence.Network_cn: 发现在链间的Co ( II ) 离子之间存在着较弱的反铁磁相互作用.

sentence.Network_en: Antiferromagnetic transition has soft modulus effect while martensitic transformation also accompanied by a soft phonon mode.
sentence.Network_cn: 反铁磁转变存在模量软化,马氏体相变也具有声学软模.

sentence.Network_en: The temperature dependence of exchange bias and coercivity ferromagnetic layer and antiferromagnetic gain layer is discussed.
sentence.Network_cn: 讨论了铁磁反铁磁双层膜中交换偏置和矫顽场随温度变化的关系.
